radiographic_examinations.findings: Metaphyseal changes in all long bones, digital phalanges, and the iliac crest, comprising irregular, flared, radioopaque regions subjacent to the growth plates.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: The extent of the radiopaque bands in the lower limbs had progressed compared to x-rays taken at 7.2 years.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Increased metaphyseal uptake, but no other abnormality.
Increased extent of the metaphyseal radioopaque bands; the diaphyseal bone architecture and density were normal.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Continued progression of the metaphyseal appearance noted until 15.3 years.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Improvement in the radiological appearance of the metaphyses with some improvement in growth.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Continued regression of the disease observed in subsequent x-rays.
Conclusion of radiological improvement over the years.
